<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Remove auto-generated ACLs for role 'nobody' from Activity tables</description>
        <name>Remove Nobody ACLs from Activity Tables</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
    if (pm.isZboot())
        return;

    gs.log('Running fix script: "Remove Nobody ACLs from Activity Tables"');
    var operations = ['create', 'delete', 'write'];
    var supplementalAcls = new GlideRecord('sys_security_acl');
    supplementalAcls.addQuery('name', 'STARTSWITH', 'sys_activity_supplemental');
    supplementalAcls.addQuery('operation.name', operations);
    supplementalAcls.query();

    var aclsToDelete = [];
    while (supplementalAcls.next()) {
        if (!hasNobodyAclRole(supplementalAcls))
            continue;

        aclsToDelete.push(supplementalAcls.getUniqueValue());
    }

    var activityAcls = new GlideRecord('sys_security_acl');
    activityAcls.addQuery('name', 'sys_activity');
    activityAcls.addQuery('operation.name', ['delete']);
    activityAcls.query();

    while (activityAcls.next()) {
        if (!hasNobodyAclRole(activityAcls))
            continue;

        aclsToDelete.push(activityAcls.getUniqueValue());
    }

    var aclDeleteQuery = new GlideRecord('sys_security_acl');
    aclDeleteQuery.addQuery('sys_id', aclsToDelete);
    aclDeleteQuery.query();

    gs.log('Deleting ' + aclDeleteQuery.getRowCount() + ' autogenerated Activity ACLs');

    aclDeleteQuery.deleteMultiple();

    function hasNobodyAclRole(acl) {
        var aclRole = new GlideRecord('sys_security_acl_role');
        aclRole.addQuery('sys_security_acl', acl.getUniqueValue());
        aclRole.addQuery('sys_user_role', 'b05940500a0a0aa70090a4893f6ff35d');
        aclRole.query();

        return aclRole.next() ? aclRole : null;
    }
})();]]></script>
